title: Drawing, "Book-and-Display Shelves and Drawers Unit", 1930s
markings: Stamped in black ink at lower right, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, dimensions and materials, throughout. Inscribed in graphite at lower right, [Deskey #] 7773. Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right, P.
description: The purpose of open shelves may be to display trophies, as trophy like objects are included in the drawing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Book-and-Display Shelves and Drawers Unit", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1732.
